caption.center: Philip WHITE and Kathleen D. White, Appellants (Defendants), v. Willard
M. WOODS and Cynthia S. Woods, Appellees (Plaintiffs). John D. Adamson,
Appellant (Defendant), v. Willard M. Woods and Cynthia S. Woods,

opinion.opinion_text:
[EDITORS' NOTE: THE OPINION ORIGINALLY APPEARING ON PAGES 1053-1063 WAS WITHDRAWN.]
The order of the Supreme Court of Wyoming, in White v. Woods, published in the advance sheet at this citation, 202 P.3d 1053, was with drawn from the bound volume because it was amended. For amended opinion, see 2009 WL 857477.Page 1064
